article_title: Recruiting Scandal Rocks Army National Guard
article_text:
Hundreds of soldiers are under criminal investigation for a scamming an Army National Guard program that paid millions in bonuses to soldiers who persuaded friends to sign up.

According to a report in USA Today, one soldier allegedly took in $275,000 in illegal kickbacks. A Senate subcommittee is holding a hearing on the scandal today.

USA Today military reporter Tom Vanden Brook joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Guest
